CustomField.description: This field is getting used in visualforce page "icPaymentInvoicePDF" for generation of Account Payment Invoices.
CustomField.formula: IF( Contractor__r.Name !='APPLICANTS', IF(ISPICKVAL(Contractor__r.BillingCountryCode,'CA'), 'Attn: Nadine Ouellette', IF(ISPICKVAL(Contractor__r.BillingCountryCode,'US'),'', '')), IF(CONTAINS(Applicant__r.Country_Code_Applicant__c,'CA'), 'Attn: Nadine Ouellette', IF(CONTAINS(Applicant__r.Country_Code_Applicant__c,'US'),'', '')))
CustomField.label: HIDDEN Field - Attn
